# Huzefa Nalkheda Wala - AI Product Engineer Portfolio

> AI Product Engineer at CleverFlow specializing in Medical AI, Large Language Models (LLMs), Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) systems, and Computer Vision. Creator of MedGenius LLaMA-3.2B medical AI model with 40K+ curated medical dialogues. Patent holder (Design No. 375474-001) and published AI researcher from IIT Ropar.

## Professional Summary

Huzefa Nalkheda Wala is an AI Product Engineer at CleverFlow with 3+ years of experience building production-grade AI systems. He specializes in:

- **Medical AI & Healthcare Technology**: Fine-tuned medical LLMs (MedGenius LLaMA-3.2B), curated 40K+ medical dialogue datasets, developed patient-doctor dialogue systems
- **Large Language Models (LLMs)**: Production RAG systems, LangChain integration, prompt engineering, model fine-tuning (LoRA/QLoRA), LLaMA deployment
- **Document Intelligence**: Built enterprise document processing systems handling 10K+ documents, multimodal AI solutions, OCR pipelines
- **Computer Vision**: Developed real-time vision systems (30 FPS), OpenCV expertise, medical imaging analysis
- **Production ML Deployment**: Docker containerization, FastAPI microservices, Redis caching, vector database optimization (Qdrant, Faiss)

**Key Achievements:**
- Medical Equipment Innovation Patent (Design No. 375474-001, 2024)
- Published AI Research Papers
- ≈1000 GitHub Contributions (2025)
- 40+ Merged Production PRs
- 45+ Production Features Deployed
- Top 3% on HackerRank
- Vadodara Startup Festival Winner

**Education:**
- AI & ML Specialization from IIT Ropar (2024-2025)
- B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering from Parul University (2021-2025)

**Location:** Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India

**Availability:** Open for AI Engineering roles, ML consultancy, and research collaboration

## Core Skills

### AI/ML Frameworks & Tools
- PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face Transformers
- LangChain, LlamaIndex, OpenCV
- YOLO, Scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy

### Languages & Backend
- Python (Expert), TypeScript, JavaScript
- FastAPI, Django, Node.js, Express.js

### Databases & Vector Stores
- PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
- Qdrant, Faiss, Pinecone (Vector DBs)

### DevOps & Cloud
- Docker, GitHub Actions, Git
- AWS S3, Railway, Vercel
- RESTful APIs, WebSocket

## Featured Projects

### MedGenius LLaMA - Medical AI Assistant
- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/huzaifa525/MedGenius-LLaMA)
- [Hugging Face Model](https://huggingface.co/huzaifa525/MedGenius-LLaMA-3.2-1B)
- Fine-tuned LLaMA 3.2 1B model on 40,000+ curated medical dialogues
- Specialized medical chatbot for patient-doctor interactions
- Achieves human-like medical consultation responses
- Technologies: PyTorch, Hugging Face, LoRA, Unsloth

### Real-Time Document Intelligence System
- Production enterprise AI system at CleverFlow
- Processes 10,000+ documents with multimodal analysis
- 40+ merged PRs, 45+ production features deployed
- RAG architecture with vector database optimization
- Technologies: LangChain, Qdrant, FastAPI, Docker, Redis

### AI-Powered Medical Equipment Innovation
- Patent holder (Design No. 375474-001)
- Novel medical device with AI integration
- Published research and patent documentation
- Focus on healthcare technology innovation

### Computer Vision Real-Time Systems
- 30 FPS real-time object detection and tracking
- OpenCV-based vision pipelines
- Medical imaging analysis applications
- YOLO integration for efficient detection
